00049 using namespace Hypertable;
00050 using namespace Config;
00051 using namespace std;

00053 namespace {
00054 
00055   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00056     static void init_options() {
00057       cmdline_desc("Usage: %s [options] <filename>\n\n"
00058         "Dumps the contents of the CellStore contained in the DFS <filename>."
00059         "\n\nOptions").add_options()
00060         ("all,a", "Dump everything, including key/value pairs")
00061         ("count,c", "Count the number of key/value pairs")
00062         ("end-key", str(), "Ignore keys that are greater than <arg>")
00063         ("start-key", str(), "Ignore keys that are less than or equal to <arg>")
00064         ;
00065       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("filename", str(), "");
00066       cmdline_positional_desc().add("filename", -1);
00067     }
00068     static void init() {
00069       if (!has("filename")) {
00070         HT_ERROR_OUT <<"filename required" << HT_END;
00071         cout << cmdline_desc() << endl;
00072         exit(1);
00073       }
00074     }
00075   };
00076 
00077   typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DfsClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00078 
00079 } // local namespace
00080 
00081 
00082 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00083   try {
00084     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00085 
00086     bool dump_all = has("all");
00087     bool count_keys = has("count");
00088     String start_key = get("start-key", String());
00089     String end_key = get("end-key", String());
00090     bool got_end_key = has("end-key");
00091     bool hit_start = start_key.empty();
00092     int timeout = get_i32("timeout");
00093     String fname = get_str("filename");
00094 
00095     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager();
00096 
00097     DfsBroker::Client *dfs = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, properties);
00098 
00099     if (!dfs->wait_for_connection(timeout)) {
00100       cerr << "error: timed out waiting for DFS broker" << endl;
00101       exit(1);
00102     }
00103 
00104     Global::block_cache = new FileBlockCache(200000000LL);
00105 
00109     CellStoreV0Ptr cellstore = new CellStoreV0(dfs);
00110     CellListScanner *scanner = 0;
00111 
00112     cellstore->open(fname.c_str(), 0, 0);
00113 
00114     cellstore->load_index();
00115 
00119     uint64_t key_count = 0;
00120     ByteString key, value;
00121     Key key_comps;
00122 
00126     if (dump_all || count_keys) {
00127       ScanContextPtr scan_ctx(new ScanContext());
00128 
00129       scanner = cellstore->create_scanner(scan_ctx);
00130       while (scanner->get(key_comps, value)) {
00131 
00132         if (!hit_start) {
00133           if (strcmp(key_comps.row, start_key.c_str()) <= 0) {
00134             scanner->forward();
00135             continue;
00136           }
00137           hit_start = true;
00138         }
00139         if (got_end_key && strcmp(key_comps.row, end_key.c_str()) > 0)
00140           break;
00141         if (count_keys)
00142           key_count++;
00143         else
00144           cout << key_comps << endl;
00145         scanner->forward();
00146       }
00147       delete scanner;
00148     }
00149 
00150     if (count_keys) {
00151       cout << key_count << endl;
00152       return 0;
00153     }
00154 
00158     cout << endl;
00159     cout << "BLOCK INDEX:" << endl;
00160     cellstore->display_block_info();
00161 
00162 
00166     CellStoreTrailer *trailer = cellstore->get_trailer();
00167 
00168     cout << endl;
00169     cout << "TRAILER:" << endl;
00170     cout << *trailer;
00171 
00172     cout << endl;
00173     cout << "OTHER:" << endl;
00174     cout << "split row '" << cellstore->get_split_row() << "'" << endl;
00175   }
00176   catch (Exception &e) {
00177     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00178     return 1;
00179   }
00180 
00181   return 0;
00182 }
